event.title: a few years, but residents of Cooke County are hopeful a new Texas Department of Transportation construction project will help

data.event: It could take a few years, but residents of Cooke County are hopeful a new Texas Department of Transportation construction project will help make a dangerous Highway 82 intersection safer.

event.title: at least two years ago, Hollowell said

data.event: A group of commissioners wrote the resolution and presented it to TxDOT at least two years ago, Hollowell said.
“We think it will be let in 2010 or 2012,” Hollowell said.
“We think it will be let in 2010 or 2012,” Hollowell said.
